## How to Start?
1. Click on the relevent tutoring session's link in the 'Online Tutoring Schedule' below.
2. "Allow" zoom.us to open.
3. If you are a first time zoom user, you may need to install zoom in this step.
4. Click "Join".

</p>
</div>
